content: शुल्कः, --लकं [शुल्क्यते अतिसृज्यते कर्मणि घञ्] {@--1@} A toll, tax, customs, duty; particularly levied at ferries, passes, roads &c.; कः सुधीः संत्यजेद्रांडं शुल्कस्यैवातिसाध्वसात् <ls>H. 3. 125</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 159</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 47.</ls> {@--2@} Gain, profit. {@--3@} Money advanced to ratify a bargain. {@--4@} Purchase-price (of a girl); money given to the parents of a bride; पीडिवो दुंहितृशुल्कसंस्थया <ls>R. 11. 38</ls>; न कन्याया पिता विद्वान् गृह्णीयाच्छुल्कमण्वपि <ls>Ms. 3. 51</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 204</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 93</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">98.</ls> {@--5@} A nuptial present. {@--6@} Marriage settlement or dowry. {@--7@} Present given by the bride-groom to his bride.
